archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Establish, Manage, and Develop Service Infrastructure Organization, Tools and Processes
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Establishing, Creating, Managing, and developing organization, Tools and processes for operations of new/or modified service infrastructure.
